item.title: KBD Event need some ideas
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

[quote=“jakkie123, post:3, topic:77398”]Ideas for reward: Dragon stuff, some coins (like 2/5M or something), maybe a santa or Phat
Any other ideas: sorry, i haven’t[/quote]Appart from Drops,no items like phat or santa[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 02:40:27 PM[/size][hr][quote=“i am noob, post:4, topic:77398”]oo oo oo IDEA The Baby Dragons Spawn Around the kbd attempting to defend they spawn as the KBD is being attacked.[/quote]i was thinking about that but that would be allot harder then making them spawn when the kbd died,u decide :

When killed Some(10,15,20) Baby black dragons the KBD spawns (KBD Protect’s Baby’s)

When the KBD is being Attacked some Baby Black Dragons spawn (Baby’s Protect KBD)

When KBD dies the Baby Black Dragons spawn and attack (Both aggresief)

Read full topic
